radiographic_examinations.findings: There is a focal consolidation in the lateral left lower lobe, worrisome for pneumonia. The appendix is fluid filled, hyperemic and distended measuring up to 7 mm. There is no extraluminal air or surrounding fluid collection to suggest perforation. A small amount of pelvic free fluid is identified. A cystic lesion within the left ovary is a probable corpus luteum. No acute fracture or bone destructive lesion was identified.
